columns.ID: The unique identifier for each instructor teaching a course.
columns.course_id: The identifier for the specific course being taught.
columns.sec_id: The identifier for the specific section of the course.
columns.semester: The semester in which the course section is offered.
columns.year: The year in which the course section is offered.

teaches.table_description: The table records which instructors teach specific courses in given semesters.

columns.building: The name of the building where the classroom is located.
columns.room_number: The unique identifier for the specific classroom within the building.
columns.capacity: The maximum number of students the classroom can accommodate.

classroom.table_description: The table catalogs classrooms, their locations, and capacities in the college.

columns.ID: The unique identifier for each instructor in the college.
columns.name: The full name of the instructor.
columns.dept_name: The department to which the instructor is affiliated.
columns.salary: The annual salary of the instructor.

instructor.table_description: The table stores details about instructors, their departments, and salaries.

columns.course_id: The identifier for the specific course associated with the section.
columns.sec_id: The unique identifier for each section of the course.
columns.semester: The semester during which the course section is offered.
columns.year: The academic year in which the course section is conducted.
columns.building: The name of the building housing the classroom for the section.
columns.room_number: The identifier for the specific classroom where the section meets.
columns.time_slot_id: The identifier for the scheduled time slot of the section.

section.table_description: The table defines sections of courses along with their scheduling details.

columns.course_id: The identifier for the primary course requiring prerequisites.
columns.prereq_id: The identifier for the prerequisite course needed before enrollment.

prereq.table_description: The table clarifies prerequisite relationships between courses in the college.

columns.dept_name: The unique name identifying each academic department in the college.
columns.building: The name of the building where the department's offices are located.
columns.budget: The allocated budget for departmental operations and activities.

department.table_description: The table organizes academic departments along with their locations and budgets.

columns.course_id: The unique identifier for each course in the college.
columns.title: The title of the course, indicating its subject matter.
columns.dept_name: The name of the department offering the course.
columns.credits: The number of credits awarded upon completing the course.

course.table_description: The table lists courses offered, including titles, departments, and credit values.

columns.ID: The unique identifier for each student enrolled in the college.
columns.name: The full name of the student.
columns.dept_name: The department to which the student belongs.
columns.tot_cred: The total number of credits earned by the student.

student.table_description: The table tracks students, their departments, and earned credits.

columns.ID: The unique identifier for each student enrolled in a course.
columns.course_id: The identifier for the specific course taken by the student.
columns.sec_id: The unique identifier for the section of the course.
columns.semester: The semester during which the student is enrolled in the course section.
columns.year: The academic year when the course section is taken.
columns.grade: The final grade received by the student in the course section.

takes.table_description: The table records student enrollments, course sections, and associated grades.

columns.i_ID: The unique identifier for each instructor assigned as an advisor.
columns.s_ID: The unique identifier for each student assigned to an advisor.

advisor.table_description: The table associates students with their respective academic advisors.

columns.time_slot_id: The unique identifier for each time slot entry.
columns.day: The day of the week when the time slot occurs.
columns.start_hr: The hour at which the time slot begins.
columns.start_min: The minute at which the time slot begins.
columns.end_hr: The hour at which the time slot ends.
columns.end_min: The minute at which the time slot ends.

time_slot.table_description: The table specifies time slots indicating start and end times for classes.
